body.p: When installing an Aggregator Reactor over existing conduit in the concrete floor, conduits may not align with the bottom cable entry panels. The Aggregator Reactor can have an optional side car that provides additional cable entry space to enable conduit installed in the concrete floor to correctly align with cable entry panels.
The side car interior is open with no panels between the side car and the Aggregator Reactor bus bars, providing easy access to bus bars.
